snippet: Dr. Smith, an orthodontist, designed ski goggles that led to today’s fog-free and condensation-free goggles.
abstract: Bob Smith, orthodontist and inventor of improved ski goggles, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Smith, an orthodontist, designed ski goggles that led to today’s fog-free and condensation-free goggles.

headline.seo: Bob Smith, Inventor of Fog-Free Ski Goggles, Dies at 78
headline.main: Bob Smith, Inventor of Fog-Free Ski Goggles, Dies at 78
headline.print_headline: Bob Smith, 78, Inventor of Improved Ski Goggles
